profile_summary: As a Machine Learning Engineer with over 9 years of experience, I specialize in **Machine Learning**, **Python**, and cloud services including **AWS**, **GCP**, and **Azure**. My expertise extends to advanced technologies such as **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, **Spark**, **Dask**, and **PySpark**. I excel in monitoring, debugging, and optimizing complex systems while leading cross-functional teams and mentoring junior engineers. My commitment to enhancing accessibility and driving technical excellence ensures impactful project delivery that enhances user experience and fosters innovation.
